item.title: Stencil Fonts 5

LooseVersion ('4.0.0')

Exploratory Data Analysis

How distinct are the segments and their associated letters?

item.title: Stencil Fonts 2
item.description:
Cleanup Input Files

From the same input file -- converted from a pdf -- create three files for processing:

  1. The main inference file that has white/black split at a grey level of 150
  2. A file used by the Tesseract OCR utility that is either white (255) or black (0)
  3. Sample letters â€¦

item.title: Stencil Fonts 1
item.description:
Recognition of Dashed Stencil Fonts

For many years the ability of computers to optically recognize characters (OCR) has been considered a solved problem. Computer models such as Tesseract and FastText can identify and label characters, words, sentences and paragraphs without difficulty with high reliability and accuracy. Currently these abilities are â€¦
